plot: Abducted and held in a forest, a young woman fights for her life. The Silence pays homage to Ingmar Bergman's, The Seventh Seal, in a modern interpretation of his enduring theme, the silence of God in the face of human suffering.
title: The Silence
plot_es: Abducted and held in a forest, a young woman fights for her life. The Silence pays homage to Ingmar Bergman's, The Seventh Seal, in a modern interpretation of his enduring theme, the silence of God in the face of human suffering.
